<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dialogue</string>
            <string language="es">Diálogo</string>
            <string language="ga">Dialóg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dialog</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dialogue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diálogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dialogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό παράθυρο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Introduction to the concept of direct dialogue, based on a conversation between two snakes.</string>
            <string language="es">Introducción al concepto de diálogo directo, basado en una conversación entre dos serpientes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Réamhra ar choincheap an dialóg díreach, bunaithe ar chomhrá idir dhá nathair.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung zum Konzept des direkten Dialogs, 
basiert auf einem Gespräch zwischen zwei Schlangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction au concept du dialogue direct, basé
sur une conversation entre deux serpents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução ao conceito do diálogo direto, 
baseado em uma conversação entre duas serpentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione al concetto del dialogo diretto, 
basato su una conversazione fra due serpenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στην έννοια του άμεσου διαλογικού παραθύρου,
βασισμένη σε μια συνομιλία μεταξύ δύο φιδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
